text: Kogda, nakonets, [Musa] pribyl k kolodtsu v Madyane, on obnaruzhil tam lyudey, kotoryye poili [skot]. Nepodaleku ot nikh on uvidel dvukh zhenshchin, kotoryye otognali v storonu [ovets]. On sprosil: "U vas vse v poryadke?" Oni otvetili: "My podozhdem, poka pastukhi ne otoydut [ot kolodtsa], a potom napoim [nashikh ovets]. Otets-to u nas ochen' staryy, [i nam prikhoditsya vse delat' samim]
